sections.name: App Story
sections.content: An application that manages a collection of records. Each record has an id and associated data. Records can be created, listed, and deleted. Data persists locally as JSON between runs.

sections.name: Entry Point
sections.content:
Run with: python main.py

main.py wires up dependencies and calls service methods directly to demonstrate core operations (create, list, delete). No command-line arguments. No stdin input. No interactive commands. Results print to stdout.
